file_edits.reasoning: Added docstring for UserProfileInline class describing its purpose as an inline admin interface for user profile details

edits.content:
class UserProfileInline(admin.StackedInline):
    """Inline admin interface for UserProfile model within User admin."""
    model = UserProfile
    can_delete = False
    verbose_name_plural = 'Profile Details'
edits.description: Added docstring for UserProfileInline class describing its purpose as an inline admin interface for user profile details

file_edits.reasoning: Added docstring for RIACompanyPreviewSerializer class describing its purpose as a serializer for RIA company preview data

edits.content:
class RIACompanyPreviewSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    """Serializer for RIA company preview data with basic company information."""
    name = serializers.CharField(required=False, allow_null=True)
    crd = serializers.IntegerField(required=False, allow_null=True)
    city = serializers.CharField(required=False, allow_null=True)
edits.description: Added docstring for RIACompanyPreviewSerializer class describing its purpose as a serializer for RIA company preview data
